Hello
I am ExtraBigClientTest.txt
I require multiple packets, because I am larger than 512 Bytes.
In fact, I am exactly <REDACTED>> Bytes and will require 2 packets to send of this data.
582 Bytes is a lot more words than I anticipated. So I will fill up this file with spam.
LALALALALALA
LEDULLEDULLEDULLEDUL
LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
Amogsus
Did you know that when you shift down
like this
another byte is allocated as an end-line flag
~~the more you knoooowwww~~
are we at <REDACTED> Bytes yet?
no?
not even close, still more to go

finished :)
